title: The Garden
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: In The Garden, students use illustrations to identify different types of vegetables grown in a garden. The simple repetitive phrases, supportive pictures, and use of the high-frequency word the make this book easy for beginning readers.
meta: beans, corn, garden, melons, onions, peas, potatoes, tomatoes
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Nouns : Recognize and understand that nouns are naming words
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word the
